history.content: I'm in Amsterdam for a short business trip and need a hotel with good Wi-Fi and a desk, not too fancy and not too far from the center. What do you suggest?
The Modern Hideaway is a great choice for you. It offers good Wi-Fi and a desk, is not too fancy, and is located close to the center.
Could you also tell me more about the breakfast service? I'd appreciate if there was a buffet option available.

The Modern Hideaway provides breakfast in the morning, although it's not specified whether it includes a buffet. However, the hotel does offer room service, so you can request breakfast through them if necessary.
Do they have any parking facilities nearby? That would be convenient since my car needs to be picked up at the airport tomorrow.
Yes, The Modern Hideaway has parking facilities nearby. This will make it easy for you to park your car before heading to the airport.
Could you also check if there's an early check-in option? My flight arrives late tonight, and I don't want to miss out on any appointments.
Unfortunately, The Modern Hideaway does not offer early check-in. However, you might consider checking other nearby hotels that do provide this service. They should be able to accommodate your needs.
Could you also confirm if there's a gym facility where I can work out during my stay?
Yes, The Modern Hideaway has a gym facility on-site. This will allow you to keep fit while you're in Amsterdam.
Thank you, that was very helpful. That's all I needed, goodbye.
